message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CG, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with generating textures for backgrounds in games and movies, which falls under computer graphics (cs.GR). The use of illumination models and textures also suggests computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as possible sub-categories. The specific use of Wang tiles and hash functions for tiling also suggests computational geometry (cs.CG) as a possible sub-category. Finally, the simplicity and ease of implementation of the algorithm suggests machine learning (cs.LG) as a possible sub-category.
